creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four lines of carefully spaced, elegantly penned calligraphy; two-part oval relief stamp at LLC; mounted on a much larger sheet of paper
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seal, and Marks

[ 山寒。。。] (See file)
markings: LLC, in red, two-part oval relief; on back, in pencil, various marks; on mount, LRQ, in marker: [Goto Shikkoku]; on mount, LRQ, in pencil, various marks including Japanese inscription
title: Poetic Couplet
